summary: "The Brady Bunch" is an American TV show about a big family with six kids. It aired from 1969 to 1974, but became more popular after it was shown again on TV in 1975. Even though it wasn't a big hit at first, many kids and teens love it now. The show led to many spin-offs, including movies and TV films. One episode is even considered one of the best TV episodes of all time. The Brady Bunch is now seen as an important part of American culture.
title: The Brady Bunch
